name: Sounds of Harmony - The Interlude of a New Dawn
name_original: Sounds of Harmony - The Interlude of a New Dawn
description:
DEVELOPMENT STATUS:  [ Completed ]
This Game was made for the ' Sounds of Harmony ' Contest.

Hello everyone, it's me again, ScorchedGround.

This time I have participated in the "Let's Make a Scene: Sounds of Harmony Contest!" 

The maximum duration of the cutscene was set to be 5 minutes,  but I slightly shot over that mark to be honest.

However, This is largely due to the ending screen taking up around 15 seconds.

So I hope this won't be an issue.

Anyways, I hope you enjoy this little experience.

DEVELOPER NOTES:

- This is an RPG Maker MV game

- This is a non-interactive game containing a single cutscene

- The game takes about ~5 minutes in its entirety
